author: wn.com
title: Paul Ryan’s offer challenges the permanently disgruntled conservative class
text: Last week, before Rep. Paul Ryan (R-Wis.) confirmed that he'd conditionally be a candidate for Speaker of the House, visitors to The Drudge Report occasionally saw an ominous web ad. Next to a picture of Ryan's face was the warning: " Stop Paul Ryan, the Homosexual Lobby's Trojan Horse for Speaker. " Anyone who clicked was sent to […] ...
